59 class PxPlaneGeometry : public PxGeometry
60 {
61 public:
62  PX_INLINE PxPlaneGeometry() : PxGeometry(PxGeometryType::ePLANE) {}

72 
73 PX_INLINE bool PxPlaneGeometry::isValid() const
74 {
75  if (mType != PxGeometryType::ePLANE)
76  return false;
77 
78  return true;
79 }
80

88 PX_FOUNDATION_API PxTransform PxTransformFromPlaneEquation(const PxPlane& plane);
89 
97 PX_INLINE PxPlane PxPlaneEquationFromTransform(const PxTransform& transform)
98 {
99  return transform.transform(PxPlane(1.f,0.f,0.f,0.f));
100 }
